products.title: Cappuccino
products.description: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam (microfoam)

products.title: Black Coffee
products.description: Black coffee is simply a mixture of water and coffee without any cream.

products.title: Cortado
products.description: The cortado coffee is a newcomer to the world of coffee, it only popping up on shop in the last few years.

products.title: Normal Coffee
products.description: An authentic coffee snob is someone who demands a regular coffee, with cream (or milk) and two sugars.

products.title: Cappuccino
products.description: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam (microfoam)

products.title: Mocha
products.description: Mocha means a type of quality coffee made from a specific coffee bean. It was originally grown in Mocha, Yemen.

products.title: Macchiato
products.description: In Italian, the term macchiato translates as marked or stained, meaning a stained or marked coffee.

products.title: Iced Coffee
products.description: The iced version will not have frothy or steamed milk, as it simply doesn't translate well into the iced version.

products.title: Irish Coffee
products.description: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam (microfoam)

products.title: Drip Coffee
products.description: Drip coffee is made by pouring boiling water over ground coffee.

products.title: Instant Coffee
products.description: The soluble and volatile contents of beans are extracted. Then water is removed so concentrated powder are left over.

products.title: Decaf
products.description: Made in a process to remove the majority of the caffeine. However, decaffeinated coffee is not completely caffeine free
